body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Luxe Hotels customer service. My name is Jordan Richardson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christina. Can I assist you with resolving any concerns or issues today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a problem with the pricing of my recent hotel reservation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To assist you further, could you please provide me with your reservation number and the date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my reservation number is seven four five eight and I stayed at the hotel from the twenty fifth of June to the twenty ninth of June.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Christina. I will look into this matter and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Christina. We aim to provide excellent service to our guests. Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your assistance. Goodbye.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye, Christina. Have a great day!
